              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-photography" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/10/magical-starry-sky-in-new-zealand-cave/">

             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-design " id="post-694207">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-design" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/09/mixing-new-york-and-paris-in-old-photographs/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">
                <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/arc-triomphe-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/arc-triomphe-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="344x222" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/arc-triomphe-344x222.jpg" media="(max-width:1020px)">
                </source>
                <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/arc-triomphe-440x285.jpg" alt="Mixing New York and Paris in Old Photographs"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->
                <!--[if IE 9 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/arc-triomphe-440x285.jpg" alt="Mixing New York and Paris in Old Photographs"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

            <li>
             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-design " id="post-694563">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-design" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/10/food-emojis-reproduced-in-real-life/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">
                <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/emojiinthewild-0-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/emojiinthewild-0-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="344x222" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/emojiinthewild-0-344x222.jpg" media="(max-width:1020px)">
                </source>
                <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/emojiinthewild-0-440x285.jpg" alt="Food Emojis Reproduced in Real Life"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

            <li>
             <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-pop-culture " id="post-670703">
              <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-pop-culture" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/06/30/best-of-creative-plant-jars-on-fubiz/">
               <picture class="img-responsive first">
                <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/17-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/17-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">
                </source>
                <source data-size="344x222" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/17-344x222.jpg" media="(max-width:1020px)">
                </source>
                <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/17-440x285.jpg" alt="Best-of Creative Plant Jars on Fubiz"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

                  White Enlightened Sky Pavilion Installation
                 </a>
                </h4>
                <small class="post-info">
                 <span class="post-about">
                  <time datetime="2015-06-23T21:00:23+02:00" pubdate="">
                   Il y a 2 semaines
                  </time>

       </a>
      </li>
     </ul>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>

                 <span class="post-categories">

                 </span>
                 <h4 class="title-article without-separator">

           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </li>

                 <small class="post-info">
                  <span class="post-about">
                   <time datetime="2015-06-19T16:46:31+02:00" pubdate="">

                   </time>

                </picture>
                <div class="container-icon-video">
                 <span class="icon-play">
                  <span class="icon">
                  </span>
                 </span>
                </div>
               </a>
               <div class="container-text-loop">
                <div>
                 <span class="post-categories">

                 <h4 class="title-article without-separator">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/08/introducing-the-new-fubiz-2015/">
                   Introducing the new Fubiz 2015
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <small class="post-info">
                  <span class="post-about">
                   <time datetime="2015-07-08T23:39:58+02:00" pubdate="">
                    Il y a 2 jours
                   </time>
                   <span class="separator">

                 <!--[if IE 9 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/Iso-Still-01-compressed-440x285.jpg" alt="Introducing the new Fubiz 2015"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->

                 <img alt="Introducing the new Fubiz 2015" class="img-responsive" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/Iso-Still-01-compressed-440x285.jpg" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg"/>
                 <!--&lt;![endif]-->
                 <noscript>
                  <img alt="Introducing the new Fubiz 2015" class="img-responsive" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/Iso-Still-01-compressed-440x285.jpg"/>
                 </noscript>
                </picture>
               </a>
               <div class="container-text-loop">
                <div>
                 <span class="post-categories">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/category/technology/" style="color:rgb(128,140,209);">

                  </a>

                 <h4 class="title-article without-separator">

                <div>
                 <span class="post-categories">

                 <h4 class="title-article ">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/09/honest-wine-labels/">
                   Honest Wine Labels
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <small class="post-info">
                  <span class="post-about">
                   <time datetime="2015-07-09T08:00:06+02:00" pubdate="">
                    Il y a 2 jours
                   </time>
                   <span class="separator">
                    
                   </span>

              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-pop-culture " id="post-527111">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-pop-culture" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/04/13/best-of-creative-chairs-on-fubiz/">

                  <img alt="Scenes of Orange is the New Black in Real Locations" class="img-responsive" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/orangeisthenewblack-0-440x285.jpg"/>
                 </noscript>
                </picture>
               </a>
               <div class="container-text-loop">
                <div>
                 <span class="post-categories">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/category/pop-culture/" style="color:rgb(239,118,127);">

                <div>
                 <span class="post-categories">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/category/technology/" style="color:rgb(128,140,209);">

                  </a>
                 </span>
                 <h4 class="title-article without-separator">
                  <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/06/19/bmw-motorcycle-concept-for-sufers/">
                   BMW Motorcycle Concept for Surfers
                  </a>
                 </h4>
                 <small class="post-info">
                  <span class="post-about">
                   <time datetime="2015-06-19T16:01:45+02:00" pubdate="">
                    Il y a 3 semaines
                   </time>

             <li>
              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-technology " id="post-690407">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-technology" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/10/magical-starry-sky-in-new-zealand-cave/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">
                 <source data-size="440x285" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Glowworm1-440x285.jpg" media="(min-width:1380px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="320x207" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Glowworm1-320x207.jpg" media="(max-width:1380px) and (min-width:1020px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="344x222" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Glowworm1-344x222.jpg" media="(max-width:1020px)">
                 </source>
                 <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Glowworm1-440x285.jpg" alt="Magical Starry Sky in New-Zealand Cave"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->
                 <!--[if IE 9 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/06/Glowworm1-440x285.jpg" alt="Magical Starry Sky in New-Zealand Cave"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->
                 <!--[if !IE]&gt;&lt;!-->

              <article class="post loop-mini title-color-hover-graphic " id="post-690511">
               <a class="thumb container-img bgcolor-after-hover-graphic" href="http://www.fubiz.net/2015/07/09/hollywood-street-characters-captured-at-home/">
                <picture class="img-responsive first">

                 <!--&lt;![endif]-->
                 <noscript>
                  <img alt="Hollywood Street Characters Captured at Home" class="img-responsive" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/07/0Monroe-440x285.jpg"/>

                </picture>
               </a>
               <div class="container-text-loop">

             </ul>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
          <div class="content-single color-design">
           <article class="post loop-full" id="post-557451">
            <div class="post-content" id="post-content">
             <div class="inner-post-content">
              <p>
               Situe sur une pente raide au milieu dune fort de la ville de Karuizawa, cette incroyable galerie dart prive offre un panorama hors du commun. Mais cest surtout sa forme singulire qui nous interpelle : blanche, polygonale et minimaliste. Larchitecte
               <a href="http://ymgci.net/">
                Makoto Yamaguchi
               </a>
               ,  lorigine de ce projet, a conu cette
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/tag/villa/">
                villa
               </a>
               avec des matriaux tels que du bois, de lacier inoxydable et du verre.  dcouvrir.
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2014/11/30/white-polygonal-pavilion/">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-full wp-image-557453" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-0.jpg" height="451" src="" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-557453" height="451" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-0.jpg" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>
               <span id="more-557451">
               </span>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2014/11/30/white-polygonal-pavilion/polygonal-white-pavilion-1b/" rel="attachment wp-att-557454">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-full wp-image-557454" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-1b.jpg" height="410" src="" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-1b" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-557454" height="410" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-1b.jpg" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-1b" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2014/11/30/white-polygonal-pavilion/polygonal-white-pavilion-1bb/" rel="attachment wp-att-557455">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-full wp-image-557455" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-1bb.jpg" height="841" src="" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-1bb" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-557455" height="841" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-1bb.jpg" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-1bb" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2014/11/30/white-polygonal-pavilion/polygonal-white-pavilion-2/" rel="attachment wp-att-557456">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-full wp-image-557456" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-2.jpg" height="485" src="" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-2" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-557456" height="485" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-2.jpg" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-2" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2014/11/30/white-polygonal-pavilion/polygonal-white-pavilion-3b/" rel="attachment wp-att-557457">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-full wp-image-557457" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-3b.jpg" height="848" src="" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-3b" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-557457" height="848" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-3b.jpg" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-3b" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2014/11/30/white-polygonal-pavilion/polygonal-white-pavilion-3bb/" rel="attachment wp-att-557458">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-full wp-image-557458" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-3bb.jpg" height="412" src="" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-3bb" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-557458" height="412" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-3bb.jpg" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-3bb" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2014/11/30/white-polygonal-pavilion/polygonal-white-pavilion-4/" rel="attachment wp-att-557459">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-full wp-image-557459" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-4.jpg" height="761" src="" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-4" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-557459" height="761" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-4.jpg" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-4" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2014/11/30/white-polygonal-pavilion/polygonal-white-pavilion-8/" rel="attachment wp-att-557460">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-full wp-image-557460" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-8.jpg" height="510" src="" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-8" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-557460" height="510" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-8.jpg" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-8" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2014/11/30/white-polygonal-pavilion/polygonal-white-pavilion-9/" rel="attachment wp-att-557461">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-full wp-image-557461" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-9.jpg" height="809" src="" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-9" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-557461" height="809" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-9.jpg" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-9" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>
              <p>
               <a href="http://www.fubiz.net/2014/11/30/white-polygonal-pavilion/polygonal-white-pavilion-11b/" rel="attachment wp-att-557462">
                <img alt="" class="lazy alignnone size-full wp-image-557462" data-original="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-11b.jpg" height="825" src="" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-11b" width="640"/>
                <noscript>
                 <img alt="" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-557462" height="825" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2014/11/Polygonal-White-Pavilion-11b.jpg" title="Polygonal White Pavilion-11b" width="640"/>
                </noscript>
               </a>
              </p>

          <script type="text/javascript">
           var list = jQuery.parseJSON(autoPromos);
var temp_key, keys = [];
for(temp_key in list) {
    if(list.hasOwnProperty(temp_key)) {
        keys.push(temp_key);
    }
}
var socialPromo = list[keys[Math.floor(Math.random() * keys.length)]];
if(!isMobile){
jQuery('#div-gpt-ad-inc-2').html(''+
'&lt;a href="'+socialPromo.url+'" class="autopromo size-970x250" '+((socialPromo.url!='' &amp;&amp; socialPromo.url!='#') ? 'target="_blank"' : '')+'&gt;'+
    '&lt;div class="overlay"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/'+socialPromo.filename+'.png"&gt;'+

    '&lt;div class="background"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-1.gif" class="image_1"&gt;'+
        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-2.gif" class="image_2"&gt;'+

        '&lt;img src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/autopromo/970x250/img-4.gif" class="image_4"&gt;'+
    '&lt;/div&gt;'+
'&lt;/a&gt;'+
'').show();
}

                 <source data-size="344x222" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Back-View-Paintings-1-344x222.jpg" media="(max-width:1020px) and (min-width:767px)">
                 </source>
                 <source data-size="240x155" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Back-View-Paintings-1-240x155.jpg" media="(max-width:767px)">
                 </source>
                 <!--[if IE 8 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Back-View-Paintings-1-440x285.jpg" alt="Colorful Back View Paintings"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->
                 <!--[if IE 9 ]&gt;&lt;img class="img-responsive" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Back-View-Paintings-1-440x285.jpg" alt="Colorful Back View Paintings"/&gt;&lt;![endif]-->
                 <!--[if !IE]&gt;&lt;!-->
                 <img alt="Colorful Back View Paintings" class="img-responsive" data-src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Back-View-Paintings-1-440x285.jpg" src="/wp-content/themes/fubiz/assets/images/default/440x285.jpg"/>
                 <!--&lt;![endif]-->
                 <noscript>
                  <img alt="Colorful Back View Paintings" class="img-responsive" src="http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/02/Back-View-Paintings-1-440x285.jpg"/>
                 </noscript>
                </picture>
               </div>
              </a>

  <script>
   fire_clrz_likez_js();
function fire_clrz_likez_js(){
	jQuery('.clrz_likez[rel!=""]').each(function(){

        var el = jQuery(this);

		if(!el.hasClass('clrz_likez_active')){
			el.addClass('clrz_likez_active');
		}else {
			return 0;
		}


	    var cookievalue = readCookie('clrz_likez'+el.attr('rel'));

        if(cookievalue=='1'){
            el.addClass('bookmarked');
            el.find('.txt-bookmark').html('Bookmarked');
        }

	    if(cookievalue == null || cookievalue == '' || el.hasClass('stoplike')){
	        el.addClass('cliquable');
	        if(el.innerHTML != '...')
	            el.data('old_value', el.innerHTML);
            var params = {'post_id':el.attr('rel')};
	        if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
                params.action = 'remove';
            }
	        el.on('click',function(e){
                var params = {post_id:el.attr('rel')};
	            if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
                    params.action = 'remove';
	            }
	            jQuery.ajax({
	                method: 'get',
	                url: 'http://www.fubiz.net/wp-content/plugins/clrz_likez/likez.php',
	                noCache:true,
                    data:params,
                    beforeSend : function(){
	                    el.addClass('loading');
	                },
                    complete : function(response){

//	                    if(el.hasClass('stoplike')){
//	                        var parentel = el.getParent();
//	                        while(!parentel.hasClass('loop-mini'))
//	                            parentel = parentel.getParent();
//	                        parentel.getParent().destroy();
//	                        if($('nblikeaccount')){
//	                            $('nblikeaccount').set('html', $('nblikeaccount').get('html').toInt()-1);
//	                        }
//	                    }else{
//	                        if(response == '') response = el.data('old_value');
//	                        el.innerHTML = response;
//	                        el.removeEvents('click');
//	                        el.removeClass('//');
//	                    }
                        el.removeClass('loading');
                        el.addClass('bookmarked');
                        el.find('.txt-bookmark').html('Bookmarked');
	                }
	            });
                return false;
	        });
	    }else {
	        el.innerHTML = ''+cookievalue+'';
	    }
	});
}
  </script>
